product_name: Quixote Classic PrimaLoft Pillow with Pillowcase - Medium - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Great for travel and camping, this soft pillow uses a premium synthetic microfiber fill and a lightweight polyester shell to make an incredibly comfortable, compressible and versatile travel pillow..
